alert.note: Alert for Barber; Edwards; Kiowa; Pratt (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 20 at 7:01PM CDT until July 20 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Kiowa County in south central Kansas... Northwestern Barber County in south central Kansas... South central Edwards County in south central Kansas... Southwestern Pratt County in south central Kansas... * Until 745 PM CDT. * At 701 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Mullinville, moving east at 40 mph. THIS IS A DESTRUCTIVE STORM FOR Mullinville and Greensburg. HAZARD...90 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...You are in a life-threatening situation. Flying debris may be deadly to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be heavily damaged or destroyed. Homes and businesses will have substantial roof and window damage. Expect extensive tree damage and power outages. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Greensburg around 715 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Haviland, Wellsford, Belvidere, Croft, Cullison and Coats. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...DESTRUCTIVE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...90 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
